sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; const About = () => { return ( About Cattle Health Portal The Cattle Health Portal is an innovative platform designed to help cattle farmers and dairy managers maintain the health of their cattle. Our system leverages advanced image processing and machine learning technologies to detect cattle diseases from images uploaded by users. By providing accurate predictions and preventive measures, this portal empowers farmers to:
  • Identify diseases early to ensure timely treatment.
  • Access disease-specific preventive measures and remedies.
  • Improve cattle health and overall productivity.
Whether you're managing a small farm or a large-scale dairy operation, the Cattle Health Portal is your trusted partner for ensuring the health and welfare of your livestock. Together, let's create a healthier and more sustainable future for our cattle! ); }; export default About;
